attributes.action: Donald Trump be awarded an honorary knighthood.
attributes.background: President Trump in being of part British ancestry believes in and will support the endeavours of Great Britain in the period before and after Brexit.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
